# ambiexa

**Official namespace reservation for Ambiexa.**

This package currently serves as a **placeholder** to reserve the `ambiexa` name on PyPI for future official libraries, SDKs, and tools developed by **Ambiexa Global**.

## Purpose

Ambiexa is building technology at the intersection of:
- AI & data platforms  
- Industrial & ESG solutions  
- Sustainable infrastructure  

This package ensures a consistent and trusted namespace for upcoming releases.

## Roadmap (planned)

- JavaScript / TypeScript SDKs  
- API clients  
- Platform tooling  

Details will be published here once development begins.
